headline.main: World Cup Fans Will Need Special Identity Cards for Matches
headline.print_headline: World Cup Fans Will Need Special Identity Cards for Matches

lead_paragraph: Turkey is ruling out compromise with the United States over the involvement of Kurdish militia fighters in an assault in Syria, an obstacle for Washington's plan to deploy its strongest allies on the ground in a decisive showdown with Islamic State.
